title: Best Bits with Morgan: PART 1
itunes:title: Best Bits with Morgan: PART 1
description:
The Best Bits podcast is now officially separated into two podcasts!! This part of the podcast is the version you all have been wanting as a stand-alone, Morgan and a guest having their in-depth conversations without any interruptions. In this podcast, Morgan is by herself this week talking about some things going on in her life lately. She has some Food World news, questions we should be asking ourselves, and when she got unlucky recently.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
